events.message: I received my order last week but want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations at all.
The customer's request includes keywords related to refund and dissatisfaction, categorizing the issue under Refund.
Assigning this refund request to a customer service agent specializing in returns and refunds for immediate follow-up.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to initiate a refund, and I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and specify the reason why you would like to request a refund?
My order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description on the website, so I want my money back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. We will process the refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 2 business days.
Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the quick resolution and will look forward to the confirmation email.
The refund has now been processed successfully. Please allow 5-7 business days for the amount to appear on your original payment method.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was completed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
